Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory170.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: 'Grrrrrâ€”gargh!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Zanzibaron made some unpleasant sounds and kept rolling backward, until smashing into the wall.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'This is only possible in games. In reality, the enemy should have broken apart from our power long ago.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's probably the angles. I think the armor of that Zan-whatever is crafted very nicely.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Tsk. Next time I'll make sure I hit a home run.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The heartless judges (and executors) even gave their scores while making comments.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: 'Dammit. How could I, Zanzibaron, the Demon General lose to you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: 'But I cannot fall yet. I must protect the artifact...', 4: '1', 6: '3'}
{3: 'Zanzibaron ignored us and opened the wall behind. Inside the wall was a strange-shaped jade.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Is this one of those plots where the enemy gives us an important item?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'I guess so. I was expecting the reward after beating him, but he took it out himself. Nice!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Camu hurled his greatsword toward Zanzibaron, who accidentally dropped the jade as he tried to dodge.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab'}
{3: "Camu had already rushed forward and picked up the jade. He pulled the sword out with the other hand, and pointed it at Zanzibaron's head.", 7: '1'}
{2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: 'Urgh, we Demons...must...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Still, Zanzibaron struggled forward, completely ignoring Camu and the blade that could take his life any time. He only had the jade in his eyes.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "What's wrong with this guy?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Slightly shocked by this special move that never appeared in the game, Camu backed off a little, but he soon forced Zanzibaron back again with his blade.'}
{2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: "You are nothing but the King's minions! I curse you all!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'So Hassen really is evil, huh?', 3: '42', 4: 'What do we have to do with the King?', 5: '43'}
{2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: "Isn't that obvious? Give the artifact back to me!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: 'He must have told you to come here. Give the artifact back to me!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'When Zanzibaron was about to charge again, Camu unleashed a slash so fast that separated the space inside the room.'}
{2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: 'Darn you, heroes! This will not end like this!'}
{3: 'He then fell off the castle together with the dismembered room, making a loud sound.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hey, Camu, he looked a bit suspicious...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Just a game character doing his programmed moves. Now we have defeated the Demon General and got the artifact, let's just go.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'True. We may be able to unlock some new stories after defeating the first Boss.', 4: '3'}
